mapper.insert: insert into tbl_item (category1, category2, title, itemfee, itemname, itemfeatures, itemsize, information, img, thumbimg, imgdetail) values (#{category1}, #{category2}, #{title}, #{itemFee}, #{itemName}, #{itemFeatures}, #{itemSize}, #{information}, #{itemImg}, #{thumbItemImg}, #{itemDetailImg})
mapper.select: select ino, title, thumbimg from tbl_item order by ino desc
select ino, title, thumbimg from tbl_item where category1 = #{category1} order by ino desc
select ino, title, thumbimg from tbl_item where category1 = #{category1} and category2 = #{category2} order by ino desc
mapper.update: update tbl_item set title = #{title}, itemfee = #{itemFee}, itemname = #{itemName}, itemfeatures = #{itemFeatures}, itemsize = #{itemSize}, information = #{information}, img = #{itemImg}, thumbimg = #{thumbItemImg}, imgdetail = #{itemDetailImg} where ino = #{ino}
